references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High-definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its introduction of high-definition video generation using diffusion models, a core technology used and further developed in the current research.

references.paper_title: Videocrafter1: Open diffusion models for high-quality video generation
references.reason: This work is significant as it presents Videocrafter1, an open diffusion model for high-quality video generation, directly relevant to the current research's focus on evaluating and advancing text-to-video generation models.

references.paper_title: Videocrafter2: Overcoming data limitations for high-quality video diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is crucial because it builds upon the previous work and introduces Videocrafter2 to tackle data limitations in high-quality video diffusion model training, a key challenge in the field that the current research aims to address.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive benchmark suite for video generative models
references.reason: This paper is important due to the introduction of VBench, a multi-dimensional benchmark used to evaluate video generation models and to improve existing evaluation metrics, which directly connects to the current research.

references.paper_title: EvalCrafter: Benchmarking and evaluating large video generation models
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to the introduction of EvalCrafter, a comprehensive evaluation framework used to benchmark large video generation models and address limitations in prompt and metric diversity, which is directly relevant to the presented research.
